snippet.title: Super Mega Baseball 2 - Customization Reveal
snippet.description:
The very first look at customization features coming in Super Mega Baseball 2. 

UPDATE: Super Mega Baseball 2 is now slated to release May 1, 2018 on Xbox One, PS4 and Steam.

Footage in this video is from in-game, pre-alpha. Some things may change in the final release version.

For a full list of customization features, check out our blog: http://supermegabaseball.com/super-mega-baseball-2-customization-sneak-peak/
